entries.name: One with Nature
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

When in nature you can give yourself advantage on a Dexterity (acrobatics, and stealth) check on your turn. When you do so, you may also take the {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB}, and {@action Hide|XPHB} actions as a bonus action, that turn.

entries.name: Improvised Weaponry
entries: You have proficiency with improvised weapons.

entries.name: Enhanced Unarmed Strike
entries: When you hit with your Unarmed Strike and deal damage, you can deal Bludgeoning damage equal to {@damage 1d4} plus your Strength modifier instead of the normal damage of an Unarmed Strike.

entries.name: Push
entries: When you hit a creature with an Unarmed Strike as part of the {@action Attack|XPHB} action on your turn, you can deal damage to the target and also push it 5 feet away from you. You can use this benefit only once per turn.

entries.name: Swaying Defence
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
As a bonus action you may reduce all attack rolls against you by 1d4 and add 1d4 to your Dexterity saving throws, until the start of your next turn.

entries.name: Damage Reroll
entries: Whenever you roll a damage die for your Unarmed Strike, you can reroll the die if it rolls a 1, and you must use the new roll.

entries.name: Drunken Brawler
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

Being {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}/Drunk boosts you. You may use your bonus action to add {@dice 1d8} to your attack rolls, Dexterity and Strength checks and saving throws, while {@condition Poisoned|XPHB}, until the start of your next turn (no action required). You ignore getting disadvantage from being {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} during that time.

entries.name: Forceful Blow
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

When you hit your target with an unarmed attack or an improvised weapon, you may attempt to shove them onto the ground or into an object. When you hit your target with an unarmed attack or an improvised weapon, you may attempt to shove them onto the ground or into an object. They must succeed a Strength save against your {@variantrule Unarmed Strike|XPHB} DC. On a failure they take an additional 4d8 bludgeoning damage and are knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}. Only half damage on a success.

entries.name: Minor Telekinesis
entries: You learn the {@spell Mage Hand|XPHB} spell. You can cast it without Verbal or Somatic components, you can make the spectral hand {@condition Invisible|XPHB}, and its range and the distance it can be away from you both increase by 30 feet when you cast it. Choose Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma as the spell's spellcasting ability when you get this feature.

entries.name: Move Object
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

As an action, you can move a loose object within 30ft, that is at most a 5ft square. When you move it in this way, you can move it up to 30ft in any direction with that action. If it hits a creature, it must succeed a Dexterity saving throw, against your spell save DC using the ability chosen in Tier 1, or take {@dice 1d6} damage for each 10ft the object moved before hitting them.

entries.name: Telekinetic Shove
entries: As a Bonus Action, you can telekinetically shove one creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself. When you do so, the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw (against your spell save DC using the ability chosen in Tier 1) or be moved 5 feet toward or away from you.

entries.name: Move Creature
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

As an action you may force a creature, within 30 feet, to be moved 30 feet in any direction. They must succeed a Strength saving throw, against your spell save DC using the ability chosen in Tier 1. If they hit an object, it will count as falling damage for the distance they travelled.

entries.name: Release Force
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

As an action you push everything within 10 feet of you 10 feet away. All creatures in that area musts succeed a Strength saving throw, against your spell save DC using the ability chosen in Tier 1. On a failure they get pushed and take {@damage 4d8} force damage. Only half as much damage on a success.

entries.name: Concentration
entries: You have Advantage on Constitution saving throws that you make to maintain Concentration.

entries.name: Somatic Components
entries: You can perform the Somatic components of spells even when you have weapons or a Shield in one or both hands.

entries.name: Channel Cantrip
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

On your turn when you make a weapon attack roll, you can channel one of your cantrips, replacing the weapon's damage type with the cantrip's, as well as dealing an additional 1d4 damage (no action required). Can only be used once per turn.

entries.name: Reactive Spell
entries: When a creature provokes an Opportunity Attack from you by leaving your reach, you can take a Reaction to cast a spell at the creature rather than making an Opportunity Attack. The spell must have a casting time of one action and must target only that creature.

entries.name: Cast and Slash
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
After casting a spell, you can immediately use your bonus action to make a weapon attack.

entries.name: Imbue Weapon
entries: {@i Cost: 3 SP}

As a bonus action, you can imbue your weapon with a single target cantrip or spell of level 5 or lower, with a casting time of an action or a bonus action, expending the spell slot for it. The next time you hit, the creature also takes the effects of the spell, automatically hitting with the attack roll of the spell or having disadvantage on the saving throw if it has one.

optionalfeature.name: Wise
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

Whenever you make an {@variantrule Ability Check|XPHB}, using Wisdom, you may add your proficiency bonus to the roll total. You may add it after your make the roll, but before knowing the result (no action required). Can only be used once per turn.

optionalfeature.name: Artificer's Construct Barrier

prerequisite.other: Proficiency in one type of Artisan's Tools.

entries: {@i Cost: 5 SP}

As a Reaction upon being hit by an attack, taking damage, or making a saving throw, you can quickly create a forcefield barrier. You and all creatures within 5 feet of you gain {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Total Cover} from that effect.

optionalfeature.name: Artificer's Constructed Damage
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

As part of your {@classFeature Magical Tinkering|Artificer|TCE|1} you can craft an object that can be used as a damage boost. This object can be attached to any weapon or magical focus. That weapon or cantrips cast using that focus deal an additional {@damage 1d6} force damage. The object breaks when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. You cannot create more objects than your {@classFeature Magical Tinkering|Artificer|TCE|1} allows.

optionalfeature.name: Artificer's Constructed Defence
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

As part of your {@classFeature Magical Tinkering|Artificer|TCE|1} you can craft a protective trinket. This trinket can be attached to a creature, increasing their AC by 2 for each trinket (to a maximum of +5). The object breaks when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. You cannot create more objects than your {@classFeature Magical Tinkering|Artificer|TCE|1} allows.

optionalfeature.name: Artificer's Constructed Wheels

prerequisite.other: Proficiency in one type of Artisan's Tools.

entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

As part of a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short}, {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB} or 1 hour, you can use artisan's tools and magic to turn a large object into a vehicle with a speed of 60 feet. This vehicle can hold up to 4 medium creatures and will work for up to 8 hours or until you create a new one.

optionalfeature.name: Artificer's Constructed Wings

prerequisite.other: Proficiency in one type of Artisan's Tools.

entries: {@i Cost: 3 SP}

Using 1 minute, you can use artisan's tools and magic to turn a medium or smaller sized object into wings or other device that allows flight. The user will gain a flight speed equal to its base speed. The object lasts for 1 hour or until you craft a new one.

optionalfeature.name: Artificer's Enhanced Cantrip
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
As part of casting a cantrip, you gain a +2 bonus to attacks made with that cantrip or creatures gain a -2 penalty on saves made against that cantrip.

optionalfeature.name: Artificer's Enhanced Spell
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
As part of casting a spell of 1st level or higher, you gain a +2 bonus to attacks made with that spell and creatures gain a -2 penalty on saves made against that spell.

optionalfeature.name: Artificer's Enspelled Tools

spell.entry: Artificer Spells of level 1 or higher

entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP per level of the spell}

After finishing a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}, you can infuse your tools with one Artificer spell you have prepared, without expending a spell slot. You can cast this spell once using your tools.

optionalfeature.name: Artificer's Flash of Stupidity

optionalfeature: Artificer's The Right Tool for the Fight|WoSkTr

entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
When an enemy within 30 feet succeeds an Ability Check or Attack Roll, you can use your Reaction to impose a penalty, equal to your Intelligence modifier, on it.

optionalfeature.name: Artificer's Magical Construct
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP for each object created}

As part of your {@classFeature Magical Tinkering|Artificer|TCE|1} you can create a tiny construct. Provided it is within 60 feet, you can command it to move up to 30 feet and/or have them make a melee spell attack, using your bonus action. It deals 1d4 + Intelligence Modifier bludgeoning damage. You may only have one active at a time, but can create extra objects and combine them. Doing so will increase the damage die by one size for each added object (max of 1d12). The object breaks when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. You cannot create more objects than your {@classFeature Magical Tinkering|Artificer|TCE|1} allows.

optionalfeature.name: Artificer's Master of Tools
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
After rolling an ability check using your tools, you may add {@dice 1d6} to the result (no action required).

optionalfeature.name: Artificer's Maximal Damage
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
As a bonus action, you make your weapon attacks have a base damage die of {@dice 1d12}, until the start of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Artificer's More Critical Hits
entries: {@i Cost: 3 SP}
When you roll a 19 on the d20 of a weapon attack, Artificer spell attack, or attack made with your Magical Construct, you can turn that roll into a critical hit (no action required).

optionalfeature.name: Artificer's Skilled with Tools
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
Whenever you make a check with a tool you are not proficient in, you are considered proficient (no action required).

optionalfeature.name: Artificer's Spell Strike and Defend

prerequisite.other: Artificer Spells of level 1 or higher.

entries: {@i Cost: 5 SP}

After casting an Artificer spell of 1st level or higher, you may deal an additional {@damage 3d12} force damage to one target within 30 feet of you. Another creature within 30 feet of you gets {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the damage dealt from this feature.

entries.name: Stupidity Response
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
After a creature within weapon attack range misses you or an ally within 5 feet, you may make an {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} against them.

entries.name: Stupidity Pain Wave
entries: {@i Cost: 3 SP}
On a hit with your Stupidity Response you may deal an additional {@damage 4d12} psychic damage to the target.

optionalfeature.name: Artificer's Technical Critical Hit

optionalfeature: Artificer's The Right Tool for the Fight|WoSkTr

entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
When you score a critical hit with a weapon attack or an attack made with your Magical Construct, you may add {@dice 1d12} to the critical damage rolled. Can only be used once per attack.

optionalfeature.name: Artificer's The Right Tool for the Fight

prerequisite.other: Proficiency in one type of Artisan's Tools.

entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

As a bonus action you can quickly construct one flimsy tool, which can be used to inflict the {@condition Blinded|XPHB}, {@condition Deafened|XPHB}, or {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (your choice) to one target within 30 feet. That target must succeed a Dexterity saving throw (DC of 8 + your Wisdom modifier + your proficiency bonus) or have that condition until the end of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Angry Throw
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
As part of a melee weapon attack, you can throw the melee weapon you are holding up to 40/120 ft. Make a normal thrown attack, on a hit, the target takes the weapon's normal damage.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Barreling Charge
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
When you move at least 15 feet to a target, you have advantage on Strength based ability checks, saving throws, and deal double damage with weapon attacks that turn (no action required).

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Crippling Attack
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
After you hit with a weapon attack, you can make the target become {@condition Crippled|WoSkTr} until the end of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Critical Death
entries: {@i Cost: 5 SP}

When your weapon attack deals a critical hit to a creature, {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB|Raging}, you can force them to make a Constitution saving throw, against 8 + your Strength modifier + your proficiency bonus or half the damage, whichever one is higher. On a failure, that creature instantly dies if it has less than 100 hp remaining.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Destructive Charge
entries: {@i Cost: 4 SP}

As an action, while {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB|Raging}, you may move up to your speed, while you do so you may make one attack against any target within reach of your melee weapon. If the target is hit, they are knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB} and take the weapon's damage.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Extra Attack
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
You may make one additional weapon attack as part of the attack action. Can only be used once per turn.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Extra Critical Dice
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
After scoring a critical hit with a melee weapon, you may add another weapon damage die when determining the extra damage from the critical hit (no action required). Can only be used once per attack.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Extra Damage
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

After a hit, as part of a weapon attack, while {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB|Raging}, you may add one additional damage die to the damage. The die is equal to the one of the weapon. Can only be used once per attack.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Feral Checks
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
When you make a check you are proficient in you can add your {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB} Damage to the result, before or after rolling.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Feral Strength and Willpower
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

As a bonus action you give your saving throws, including {@variantrule Death Saving Throw|XPHB|Death Saving Throws}, gain a bonus equal to your {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB} Damage, for 1 minute.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Fierce Jump
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
As a bonus action you can jump up to three times the normal distance of a Running Jump, even exceeding your normal speed.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Force of Rage
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

As a bonus action, as part of starting or maintaining your {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB}, you can choose to make your weapon attacks deal force damage instead of the normal damage type. This effect ends when you stop {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB|Raging}.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Forceful Attack
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

As part of a weapon attack, while {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB|Raging}, you can attempt to knock the target {@condition Prone|XPHB} or 5 feet away (your choice), by forcing them to make a Strength saving throw (DC of 8 + your Strength modifier + your proficiency bonus).

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Forceful Grapple
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

After you successfully {@condition Grappled|XPHB|Grapple} a creature, you can instead make them get the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. The creature remains {@condition Restrained|XPHB} until the creature escapes the grapple.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Improved Danger Sense
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
As an action you can check for traps within 60 feet. All triggers to traps are revealed, provided you can see the area.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Invincible Muscles
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

As a bonus action, as part of starting or maintaining your {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB}, gain immunity damage types your {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB} gives resistance to, until the start of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Major Taunt
entries: {@i Cost: 5 SP}

As a bonus action, as part of starting or maintaining your {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB}, you may force all creatures, of your choice, you can see within 30 feet to make a Wisdom saving throw (DC of 8 + your Strength modifier + your proficiency bonus). On a failure they cannot move away from you and have Disadvantage on all attack rolls made against targets other than you. All other creatures also have advantage on saving throws against effects from the taunted. This lasts until they lose line of sight of you or when the {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB} ends.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Maximal Damage
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
As a bonus action, as part of starting or maintaining your {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB}, you make your weapon attacks have a base damage die of 1d12, until the start of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Meditated Rage
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

Cast a spell, with the casting time of an Action, Bonus Action, or Reaction while {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB|Raging}. You are still unable to concentrate on spells while {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB|Raging}. Casting a spell with a Bonus Action usage will also maintain the {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB}.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's More Critical Hits
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
When you roll a 19 on the d20 of a weapon attack, while {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB|Raging}, you can turn that roll into a critical hit (no action required).

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Raging Speed
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

As a bonus action, as part of starting or maintaining your {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB|Rage}, you can increase your speed by 10 feet. This increase ends when you stop {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB|Raging}.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Reckless Checks
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
You give yourself advantage on an ability check, but a failure will result in worse than normal outcomes (no action required).

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Scary Attack
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

As part of a weapon attack, while {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB|Raging}, you can attempt to frighten the target, by forcing them to make a Wisdom saving throw (DC of 8 + your Strength modifier + your proficiency bonus). On a failure the target is {@condition Frightened|XPHB} of you until the start of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Sweeping Attack
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP for each additional creature}

After making a melee weapon attack that deals bludgeoning or slashing damage, while {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB|Raging}, you can attempt hit another creature within range. Make a new attack roll for each of those creatures. Can only be used once per turn.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Taunt
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

As a bonus action, as part of starting or maintaining your {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB}, you can attempt to force all creatures within 15 feet of you to make a Wisdom saving throw (DC of 8 + your Strength modifier + your proficiency bonus). On a failure they will have Disadvantage on all attacks made against targets other than you, until the start of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Thick Muscles
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

As a bonus action, as part of starting or maintaining your {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB}, you may add your {@classFeature Rage|Barbarian|XPHB|1|XPHB} damage to your unarmoured AC, until the start of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Barbarian's Watchful Strike
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
After a creature enters the (normal) attack range of the melee/thrown weapon you are wielding, you may use your reaction to make an {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} against them.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Accurate Archer/Thrower
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

As an action to throw or shoot any object, which is at most small, up to the disadvantage range (60 for thrown objects) without requiring a check. You cannot use this feature if your intention is to damage a creature or object.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Additional Fighting Style
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

You may pick an additional {@filter Fighting Style feat|feats|category=FS}. As a bonus action you may activate the chosen {@filter Fighting Style feat|feats|category=FS}, which remains active for 1 minute.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Bladework
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
Whenever you want to make a check using Artisan's Tools or Thieves' Tools, you may replace the tools required with a weapon that suits the same purpose. You are considered proficient in this check.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Crippling Attack
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
After you hit with a weapon attack, you can make the target become {@condition Crippled|WoSkTr} until the end of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Defence Surge
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

Whenever you use you {@classFeature Action Surge|Fighter|XPHB|2}, use this feature increase your AC by 2 for each attack you hit with during your action surge (minimum of 2). The increase lasts until the start of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Extra Action
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

You may take one additional action as your bonus action. This bonus action be used to {@action Attack|XPHB}, {@action Dash|XPHB}, {@action Disengage|XPHB}, {@action Dodge|XPHB}, {@action Help|XPHB}, {@action Influence|XPHB}, {@action Search|XPHB}, {@action Study|XPHB}, {@action Utilize|XPHB}, or {@action Ready|XPHB} one of those actions.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Extra Critical Dice
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
After scoring a critical hit with weapon attack you may add another weapon damage die when determining the extra damage from a critical hit (no action required) Can only be used once per attack.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Extra Damage
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
After a hit, as part of a weapon attack, you may add one additional damage dice to the damage. The die is equal to the one of the weapon. Can only be used once per attack.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Improved Defence
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
As a Reaction upon being hit by an attack, you can increase your AC by 5. This increase lasts until the start of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Improved Range
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
As part of your weapon attack, you may double the normal and Disadvantage range for ranged weapons or increase it by 5 feet for melee weapons.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Improved Second Wind
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP per hit die spent}
When you use your {@classFeature Second Wind|Fighter|XPHB|1} feature, you may also roll your hit die, up to half your fighter level (rounded down).

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Indomitable Checks
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
Whenever you roll an ability check, you may give yourself advantage on that check (no action required).

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Inspiring Leader
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

Whenever you succeed on an ability check or saving throw, you may give another creature, that can see or hear you within 30 feet, a {@dice 1d10} bonus to use on one ability check, saving throw, or attack roll of their choice (no action required). If the dice has not been used in 1 hour, the creature loses the benefit.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Loremaster
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

As part a free action, during your turn in combat, you may attempt to learn something about the creature you are fighting or the situation you are in. For instance, you may ask about the creature's immunities and resistances, or the effect of one ability. When you do so, take the {@action Search|XPHB} or {@action Study|XPHB} action, determined by your DM. The DC for the check is 15.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Maximal Damage
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
As a bonus action, you make your weapon attacks have a base damage die of {@dice 1d12}, until the start of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Movement Surge
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
WAs part of your {@classFeature Action Surge|Fighter|XPHB|2} you may also double your movement speed that turn.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Physically Attractive
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
Whenever you make a Charisma check, you may add your Strength or Dexterity modifier (your choice) to the check total (no action required). Can be added after you already rolled.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Piercing Ammunition
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP per additional target}

When you make a ranged weapon attack, dealing piercing or slashing damage, you may attempt to hit any target in a direct line behind the first target, provided it is within the weapon's normal range. Make an attack roll for each additional target.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Protecting Hits
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

As part of the attack action, you impose Disadvantage on attack rolls made by the creatures you attack with a weapon attack, during that action. This Disadvantage lasts until the end of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Superhuman Endurance
entries: {@i Cost: 4 SP}

Whenever you take damage, you may use your Reaction to use your {@classFeature Second Wind|Fighter|XPHB|1} feature, adding {@dice 4d12} to the result. If the damage would normally reduce you to 0 HP, this ability prevents that.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Superhuman Influence
entries: {@i Cost: 4 SP}

When you or an ally, within 60 feet, is forced to make a saving throw or you need to make a group ability check, you can use your Reaction to give everyone affected, including yourself, advantage on that Saving Throw or Ability Check.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Superhuman Strike
entries: {@i Cost: 5 SP}

When you score a critical hit against a creature, with a weapon attack, you may dismember an arm or leg from that creature. The critical damage increases by an additional {@damage 5d12} of the weapon's damage type. The creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw, with a DC of 10 or half the damage dealt. On a failure they lose a limb of your choice. If the damage reduces the target to 0 hp, you can choose to instantly decapitate them.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Suppression
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
After you hit a target with a ranged weapon attack, you can make the target's speed become 0 until the start of your next turn or earlier if they are moved from that spot (no action required).

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Sweeping Attack
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP per additional target}

After making a melee weapon attack that deals bludgeoning or slashing damage, you can attempt hit another creature within range. Make a new attack roll for each of those creatures. Can only be used once per turn.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Third Wind
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
As a bonus action, you can recharge one use of your {@classFeature Second Wind|Fighter|XPHB|1}.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Trained Grapple
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

After you successfully {@condition Grappled|XPHB|Grapple} a creature, you can instead make them get the {@condition Restrained|XPHB} condition. The creature remains {@condition Restrained|XPHB} until the creature escapes the grapple.

optionalfeature.name: Fighter's Watchful Strike
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
After a creature enters the (normal) attack range of the melee/ranged weapon you are wielding, you may use your reaction to make an {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} against them.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's Antigravity Speed
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
You move so swiftly that you can move across ceilings and ignore Difficult Terrain. This effect lasts until you move less than half your speed on your turn.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's Deflect All
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

As a bonus action, you become invulnerable to damage dealt from all attacks until the start of your next turn, as you deflect them. For any attacks made against you when invulnerable, you use your reaction and spend 1 SP or 1 focus point to deflect the attack at a creature within 60 feet, as described in the {@classFeature Deflect Attacks|Monk|XPHB|3} feature.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's Extra Critical Dice
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

After scoring a critical hit with an {@variantrule Unarmed Strike|XPHB} or Monk Weapon Attack, you may add two {@classFeature Martial Arts|Monk|XPHB|1|XPHB|Martial Arts Dice} when determining the extra critical damage. Can only be used once per attack.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's Extra Damage
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

After a hit, as part of an {@variantrule Unarmed Strike|XPHB} or Monk Weapon Attack, you may add one additional damage die to the damage. The die is equal to your {@classFeature Martial Arts|Monk|XPHB|1|XPHB|Martial Arts Die}. Can only be used once per attack.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's Flying Jump
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
When you jump, you can jump up to your speed horizontally, and half your speed vertically, even when making a standing jump (no action required).

optionalfeature.name: Monk's Focus Fueled Protection
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
After hitting a creature, you can give yourself {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} equal to 3 times your Monk Level (no action required).

optionalfeature.name: Monk's Focussed Guidance
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

You can spend 10 minutes sensing the world around you for guidance. After doing so, ask the DM a question on suggested a course of action. The DM will respond truthfully, but in a manner that seems fitting.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's Improved Flurry
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
When using {@classFeature Monk's Focus|Monk|XPHB|2|XPHB|Flurry of Blows}, you may add one additional attack to it.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's Mastery of Focus
entries: {@i Cost: 5 SP}

As an action you can share your focus with your allies. All allies within 30 feet gain 3 Focus Points. After they fail a {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB|D20 Tests} they can spend one to add your {@classFeature Martial Arts|Monk|XPHB|1|XPHB|Martial Arts Die} to their result, potentially turning a failure into a success. They lose unused Focus Points after an hour.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's Maximal Damage
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

As part of an attack with an {@variantrule Unarmed Strike|XPHB} or Monk Weapon, you make your {@classFeature Martial Arts|Monk|XPHB|1|XPHB|Martial Arts Die} have a base damage die of {@dice 1d12}, until the start of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's Monk Meditation
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

Spend a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB} meditating, while thinking on a subject. You gain advantage on any ability checks related to that subject, until you finish another  {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's More Critical Hits
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
When you roll a 19 on the d20 of an {@variantrule Unarmed Strike|XPHB} or Monk Weapon Attack, you can turn that roll into a critical hit (no action required).

optionalfeature.name: Monk's Purity of Focus
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
As an action, your motives and actions cannot be easily determined anymore, for 1 hour. All creatures have disadvantage on abilty checks to determine your location, actions, and motives.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's Purity of Mind
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

As a bonus action, you can make yourself immune to effects that affect your mind for 1 minute. You become immune to effects such as psychic damage, being {@condition Frightened|XPHB}, {@condition Charmed|XPHB}, or Dominated.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's Purity of Speed
entries: {@i Cost: 5 SP}

While you are moving, you may add your {@classFeature Martial Arts|Monk|XPHB|1|XPHB|Martial Arts Die} to all ability checks, saving throws, and attack rolls (no action required). This effect lasts until you move less than half your speed on your turn.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's Saving Focus
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
When you fail a saving throw, you may add your {@classFeature Martial Arts|Monk|XPHB|1|XPHB|Martial Arts Die} to the result, potentially turning a failure into a success.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's Skill of Focus
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
Whenever you fail an ability check, you may add one {@classFeature Martial Arts|Monk|XPHB|1|XPHB|Martial Arts Die} to the result, potentially turning a failure into a success.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's Speedy Resistance
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
While using your movement, you become resistant to all damage types (no action required). This effect lasts until you move less than half your speed on your turn.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's The Fifth Chakra
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

After you hit with your attack, you can momentarily control the target's ki. The target must succeed a Wisdom saving throw (DC of 8 + your Wisdom modifier + your proficiency bonus) or be dominated by you on its next turn. While dominated in this way you can command it to move, and choose its actions, such as basic actions and actions you saw it use. Additonally, it cannot take Reactions, until the end of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's The First Chakra
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

Whenever you fail a saving throw or ability check against being knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}, Shoved, {@condition Grappled|XPHB}, or {@condition Restrained|XPHB}, you may add your {@classFeature Martial Arts|Monk|XPHB|1|XPHB|Martial Arts Die} to the result, potentially turning a failure into a success.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's The Fourth Chakra
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

As a bonus action, you can use your focus to heal a creature you can touch. The creature regains {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} equal to three {@classFeature Martial Arts|Monk|XPHB|1|XPHB|Martial Arts Die} + your Wisdom modifier.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's The Light Chakra
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

As a bonus action, while in bright light, you can open yourself to the light for 1 minute. All attacks you do deal radiant damage. Once per turn after an attack, you may attempt to blind your target or another target of your choice, within 30 feet. They must succeed a Constitution saving throw (DC of 8 + your Wisdom modifier + your proficiency bonus) or be {@condition Blinded|XPHB} until the end of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's The Second Chakra
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

As a bonus action after hitting a creature, you can attempt to leave them in awe of your skill. They must succeed a Wisdom saving throw (DC of 8 + your Wisdom modifier + your proficiency bonus) or become {@condition Charmed|XPHB} by you until the end of your next turn. While  {@condition Charmed|XPHB} in this way, the creature is considered {@condition Restrained|XPHB}.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's The Seventh Chakra
entries: {@i Cost: 5 SP}

When you are reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, you may release your chakras, in the form of an invulnerable spectral you, as a reaction. It shares your initiative and uses your statistics and items, during which it can move and make one attack, dealing force damage, move, and take a bonus action. It may use your Focus Points. Additionally, it may use all other chakra features you have access to once, free of charge. It vanishes when you finish a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}, or it has used all Chakra features.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's The Shadow Chakra
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

While in dim light or darkness, you can use your bonus action to use your ki to create tentacles of shadow for 1 minute. These tentacles have 15 feet range and deal necrotic damage. The tentacles count as {@variantrule Unarmed Strike|XPHB|Unarmed Strikes}. Additionally, you gain an additional 30 ft of darkvision.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's The Sixth Chakra
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

Whenever you roll initiative or as a free action on your turn, you can sense the ki of one opponent. You learn all its resistances, immunities, and vulnerabilities, as well as one of its signature moves.

optionalfeature.name: Monk's The Third Chakra
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
After you miss with an attack roll, you may roll a {@classFeature Martial Arts|Monk|XPHB|1|XPHB|Martial Arts Die} to add to the result, potentially turning a miss to a hit.

optionalfeature.name: Paladin's Aura of Defence
entries: {@i Cost: 3 SP}
As a bonus action, you can make your {@classFeature Aura of Protection|Paladin|XPHB|6} stronger for 1 minute. You and any ally in the aura gets a +5 bonus to their AC.

optionalfeature.name: Paladin's Distantly Faithful
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

When you cast a spell or use an ability using your {@classFeature Channel Divinity|Paladin|XPHB|3}, you may use it as if standing from your {@creature Otherworldly Steed|XPHB}'s space, provided it is within 120 feet of you.

optionalfeature.name: Paladin's Divine Charisma
entries: {@i Cost: 3 SP}

Whenever you successfully persuade or intimidate a creature, you may give them the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} (persuasion) or {@condition Frightened|XPHB} (intimidation) condition, for 10 minutes or until they take damage.

optionalfeature.name: Paladin's Divine Shield
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
As a bonus action, give yourself or an ally within 5 feet {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} equal to 3 times your paladin level.

optionalfeature.name: Paladin's Effectful Smite
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

As part of dealing damage with your {@spell Divine Smite|XPHB}, you can force the creature to make a Wisdom saving throw (DC of 8 + your Charisma modifier + your proficiency bonus). On a failure they become {@condition Charmed|XPHB}, {@condition Frightened|XPHB}, or {@condition Restrained|XPHB} (your choice) for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the save at the end of their turns.

optionalfeature.name: Paladin's Faithful Aura
entries: {@i Cost: 4 SP}
As a bonus action you can give your {@creature Otherworldly Steed|XPHB} the effects of the {@classFeature Aura of Protection|Paladin|XPHB|6}, including subclass additions to the aura, for 1 minute.

optionalfeature.name: Paladin's Impactful Smite
entries: {@i Cost: 5 SP}

Whenever you deal damage with your {@spell Divine Smite|XPHB}, you deal maximal damage and the target becomes {@condition Paralysed|XPHB} for 1 minute. The creature can end the effect early by succeeding a Wisdom save (DC 8 + your Charisma modifier + ) at the end of its turn.

optionalfeature.name: Paladin's Improved Smite
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

You may add an additional {@dice 1d8}, on top of the normal {@spell Divine Smite|XPHB} damage (no action required). If the target is a fiend or undead an additional {@dice 1d8} is added on top. Can only be used once per turn.

optionalfeature.name: Paladin's Maximal Damage
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
As a bonus action, you make your weapon attacks have a base damage die of {@dice 1d12}, until the start of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Paladin's More Critical Hits
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
When you roll a 19 on the d20 of a weapon attack, you can turn that roll into a critical hit (no action required).

optionalfeature.name: Paladin's Most Faithful
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

Your {@creature Otherworldly Steed|XPHB} can take the {@action Dash|XPHB} or {@action Disengage|XPHB} action as a bonus action. Its jump distance is doubled, until the start of its next turn, after using this feature.

optionalfeature.name: Paladin's Oath Smarts
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

As part of a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB} recount your oath and tenets and relate them to a subject of your choice. Until you finish another {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB} you have advantage on all Intelligence and Wisdom (medicine and survival) checks related to that subject.

optionalfeature.name: Paladin's Regain on Hands
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
As a bonus action you can regain spent {@classFeature Lay on Hands|Paladin|XPHB|1} charges, equal to your paladin level.

optionalfeature.name: Paladin's Retribution Strike
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

When you or an ally, within the normal range of your held weapon, is targeted by an attack, you may use your Reaction to make a weapon attack against them. When you make this attack, you impose Disadvantage on all attacks it makes until the start of its next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Paladin's Righteousness
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
When you make a Charisma (persuasion or intimidation) check, you may add {@dice 1d6} to that roll (no action required). Can be added after you rolled.

optionalfeature.name: Paladin's Skilled Smite
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP + 1 for each spell level above 1st}
Instead of spending a spell slot to use Divine Smite, use skill points instead.

optionalfeature.name: Paladin's Social Smite
entries: {@i Cost: 4 SP}

Whenever you Charm or Frighten someone, you may cast {@spell Divine Smite|XPHB} (no action required), which deals psychic damage, instead of radiant. You can even cast it if you already used a spell of 1st level or higher that turn. This damage won't end the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} or {@condition Frightened} effect, if it normally would.

optionalfeature.name: Paladin's Sword and Shield
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

When a creature hits with an attack against an ally within 5 feet, you may use your Reaction you may either increase the ally's AC by 5 (potentially turning a hit into a miss), until the start of their next turn, or make an attack against the attacker.

optionalfeature.name: Ranger's Animal Whisperer
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

After successfully performing a Wisdom (animal handling) or Charisma (persuasion or intimidation) on a Beast or Monstrosity, you can make it be {@condition Charmed|XPHB} for 10 minutes or until it takes damage (no action required).

optionalfeature.name: Ranger's Extra Attack
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
You may make one additional attack, as part of the attack action. Can only be used once per turn.

optionalfeature.name: Ranger's Extreme Roving
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

As a bonus action you can take both the {@action Dash|XPHB} and {@action Hide|XPHB} actions, which also doubles your jumping distance and allows you to move at normal speed, while Hidden, until the start of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Ranger's Hidden Strikes
entries: {@i Cost: 5 SP}

After you hit with a weapon attack against a target that can't see you, you deal an additional {@dice 5d12} damage, using the damage type of the weapon (no action required). Can only be used once per attack.

optionalfeature.name: Ranger's Hunted
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

When you mark a creature with {@spell Hunter's Mark|XPHB}, you get a +2 bonus on attack rolls against that creature, and it gets a -2 penalty on saves against your effects (no action required). This lasts as long as the target is marked. Can only be used once per {@spell Hunter's Mark|XPHB}.

optionalfeature.name: Ranger's Hunter's Critical
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

When you score a critical hit on a target marked with {@spell Hunter's Mark|XPHB}, you may add two additional {@spell Hunter's Mark|XPHB} die to the critical damage (no action required). Can only be used once per attack.

optionalfeature.name: Ranger's Hunting Traps
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

After dealing {@spell Hunter's Mark|XPHB}, force the creature to make a Constitution saving throw (DC of 8 + your Wisdom modifier + your proficiency bonus) (no action required). On a failure they become {@condition Blinded}, {@condition Frightened|XPHB}, {@condition Restrained|XPHB}, or {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} (your choice) for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the save at the end of their turns.

optionalfeature.name: Ranger's Maximal Damage
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
As a bonus action, you make your weapon attacks have a base damage die of {@dice 1d12}, until the start of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Ranger's More Critical Hits
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
When you roll a 19 on the d20 of a weapon attack, you can turn that roll into a critical hit (no action required).

optionalfeature.name: Ranger's Painful Mark
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
When you cast {@spell Hunter's Mark|XPHB} you can increase the spell's damage to {@dice 1d8} (no action required).

optionalfeature.name: Ranger's Protective Traps
entries: {@i Cost: 5 SP}

As a Reaction upon an enemy moving within 30 feet of you, you can deploy traps. All creatures of your choice, within 30 feet, must succeed a Dexterity saving throw (DC of 8 + your Wisdom modifier + your proficiency bonus) or become {@condition Restrained|XPHB} for 1 minute. They can use their action to make an Strength (atheletics) or Dexterity (acrobatics) check, against the same DC, to escape.

optionalfeature.name: Ranger's One with Nature
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
After you make a Dexterity (acrobatics or stealth), Intelligence (nature), Wisdom (animal handling or survival) check, you can turn any roll of 9 or lower, on the d20, to a 10 (no action required).

optionalfeature.name: Ranger's Shared Hunt
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
As a bonus action, after having marked a creature with {@spell Hunter's Mark|XPHB}, you give all allies a +2 bonus on attack rolls against the target, while it is marked.

optionalfeature.name: Ranger's Skilled Explorer
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
When you make a Dexterity (acrobatics or stealth), Intelligence (nature), or Wisdom (animal handling or survival) check, you may add {@dice 1d6} to the result. Can be added after you rolled.

optionalfeature.name: Ranger's The Alpha
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

Whenever a Beast or Monstrosity is {@condition Charmed|XPHB} by you, you can use your bonus action to command it. While commanding it in this manner, you take its turn, and until the start of your next turn the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} effect will not end if it takes damage from your enemies.

optionalfeature.name: Ranger's Trapping Attack
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

After hitting with a weapon attack, you can force the target to make a Strength saving throw (DC of 8 + your Wisdom modifier + your proficiency bonus) or be knocked {@condition Prone} or being Shoved 5 feet back (your choice), as well as being {@condition Grappled|XPHB} until the start of your next turn (no action required).

optionalfeature.name: Ranger's Trapping Blow
entries: {@i Cost: 5 SP}

When you deal damage from your {@spell Hunter's Mark|XPHB}, you deal an additional {@damage 6d6} force damage and {@condition Stunned|XPHB|Stun} the target for 1 minute (no action required). The target can end the effect early by succeeding a Constitution saving throw (DC of 8 + your Wisdom modifier + your proficiency bonus) at the end of each of their turns.

optionalfeature.name: Ranger's Two Targets
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
As a bonus action, after having marked a creature with {@spell Hunter's Mark|XPHB}, you may mark a second creature, within range, using the same spell. Can only mark two at a time.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Criminal Senses
entries: {@i Cost: 3 SP}
You may use a bonus action to temporarily tune your senses, for 1 minute. You gain an additional 30 feet of {@sense Tremorsense|XPHB} and {@sense Truesight|XPHB}.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Cunning
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

When you see at least one creature, within 30 feet, fail an ability check, which you are proficient in, you may use your Reaction to give them an additional {@dice 1d6} to their check result, potentially turning a failure into a success.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Cunning Attack
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
The first time after hitting with a weapon attack on your turn, you may mark that creature. You cannot get Disadvantage on weapon attacks against the creature, until the end of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Deceptive Appearance
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

When you are hit by an attack, you can roll a Charisma (deception) or Dexterity (sleight of hand) check against their passive insight (deception) or perception (sleight of hand), as a Reaction. On a success, they have Disadvantage on that and all other attacks against you until the start of their next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Dread Strikes
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP for each 1d6 replaced}

When using a {@classFeature Cunning Strike|Rogue|XPHB|5} feature, instead of spending your {@classFeature Sneak Attack|Rogue|XPHB|1} die, you can spend 1 SP for each {@dice 1d6}. You can then still use the unspent d6s for the damage of the {@classFeature Sneak Attack|Rogue|XPHB|1}.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Extra Damage
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
After a hit, as part of a weapon attack, you may add one additional damage dice to the damage (no action required). The die is equal to the one of the weapon. Can only be used once per attack.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Evasive Protection
entries: {@i Cost: 5 SP}
When you see an ally, within 30 feet, make a Dexterity saving throw, you may use your Reaction to give all allies within 30 feet {@classFeature Evasion|Rogue|XPHB|7} until the end of combat.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Hidden Trap
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

When you have at least 10 minutes to prepare a room, alleyway, or similar, that area is considered difficult terrain for your enemies. Additionally, they must subtract {@dice 1d6} from any ability check they make to interact with that area. After 8 hours the effect ends.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Improved Sneak Damage
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP per 1d6}

When you deal {@classFeature Sneak Attack|Rogue|XPHB|1} damage, you may add an additional {@dice 1d6} to the damage for each SP spent. You can spend a maximum of 3 SP for this feature for each attack.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Just a Sly Guy
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

When someone sees you fail a Charisma (deception) or Dexterity (sleight of hand or stealth) check, you may use your Reaction to roll a Charisma (performance) check, with advantage, to come across as innocent.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Maximal Damage
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
As a bonus action, you make your weapon attacks have a base damage die of 1d12, until the start of your next turn.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's More Critical Hits
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
When you roll a 19 on the d20 of a weapon attack, you can turn that roll into a critical hit.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's One with the City
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
When you are in an urban area, and you fail your Dexterity (acrobatics, sleight of hand, or stealth) check, you may add {@dice 1d6} to the roll, potentially turning a failure into a success.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Prone Shooting
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

When you make an attack roll while prone, instead of getting disadvantage, you may give yourself advantage instead (no action required). Additionally, until the start of your next turn all attacks made against you, within 5 feet, don't get advantage from attacking a {@condition Prone|XPHB} creature.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Protective Strike
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

When you see another creature within the normal attack range of your wielded weapon being targeted by an attack, you can use your Reaction to make an {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB}. Hit or miss, the target has Disadvantage on the current attack.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Quick Damage Shift
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

After dealing {@classFeature Sneak Attack|Rogue|XPHB|1} damage, you may use your bonus action to quickly adapt to your surroundings and situation. You change your {@classFeature Sneak Attack|Rogue|XPHB|1} damage type to another (within reason) for this hit.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Reliable Saves
entries: {@i Cost: 3 SP}
After rolling a saving throw, you may treat any roll of 9 or lower, on the d20, as a 10 (no action required). This feature cannot be used for death saving throws.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Sneaky Bypass
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
As a bonus action, you make your weapon attacks always ignore resistances, for 1 minute.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Sneaky Trick
entries: {@i Cost: 4 SP}

Whenever you successfully mislead a creature, using a Dexterity (sleight of hand) or Charisma (deception) check, you may deal psychic damage equal to your {@classFeature Sneak Attack|Rogue|XPHB|1} damage to them (no action). This damage will always be non-lethal and cannot be traced back to you.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Terrain's Advantage
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}

As a bonus action, you can manipulate a 15 feet radius terrain, centred on a point you attack with your wielded weapon (up to normal range only). Any creature in that area must succeed a Dexterity saving throw (DC of 8 + your Dexterity modifier + your proficiency bonus) or cannot benefit from being {@condition Invisible|XPHB}, until they use an action to remove the effect.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's The High Ground
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}
If you are at least 15 feet higher than you target, you can use your bonus action to give yourself advantage on the attack roll.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Thieves' Can
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

Whenever you make a Charisma (deception, intimidation, or persuasion) check, you may mix in a bit of Thieves' Cant to obscure your true intentions. This will allow you to add {@dice 1d6} to the roll. Can be added after you have rolled.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Trick of the Trade
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
Whenever you succeed in picking a lock, you may use your Reaction to create a copy of the key. Additionally, you will have advantage on all checks to pick a lock in that area for the next hour.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Try and Try Again
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
When you fail an ability check, you may use your Reaction to reattempt it using another ability and/or skill. You have advantage on the second check.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Ultimate Sneak Attack
entries: {@i Cost: 5 SP}

When you hit with an attack on your turn but wouldn't normally be able to add {@classFeature Sneak Attack|Rogue|XPHB|1} damage, you may still do so (no action required). This {@classFeature Sneak Attack|Rogue|XPHB|1} adds {@dice 6d6} to the damage.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Uncanny Move
entries: {@i Cost: 2 SP}
When an enemy moves within 5 feet of you, you may use your Reaction to take the {@action Disengage|XPHB} action and move up to your speed.

optionalfeature.name: Rogue's Uncanny Senses
entries: {@i Cost: 1 SP}

When you fail a saving throw of an effect that applies the {@condition Charmed|XPHB}, {@condition Frightend|XPHB}, or {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} condition, you may add {@dice 1d6} to the result, potentially turning a failure into a success (no action required).
